audioText: Les pêcheurs marchera vers la côte pour vendre leur poisson frais légalement aux restaurants locaux.
question: Why will the fishermen walk toward the coast?
options: To sell their fresh fish legally to local restaurants
To repair their fishing nets and equipment thoroughly
To meet with other fishermen for planning next trips
To check weather conditions for tomorrow's fishing expedition
explanation: The text states 'Les pêcheurs marchera vers la côte pour vendre leur poisson frais légalement aux restaurants locaux.' - The fishermen will walk toward the coast to sell their fresh fish legally to local restaurants. 'Poisson' means fish, 'marchera' is the future form of 'marcher' (to walk), and 'légalement' means legally.
source: Strategic food vocabulary development - fishing industry
